Job Description: Job Description        Looking for Java developers who are well versed with Spring Boot, Hibernate, and RDBMS such as MySQL.           As we continue to grow our apps and site, we are looking for somebody to join our Engineering team and help build out the next set of kick-ass features.            Functional Area:         API Integration Programming, Maintenance            Requirements        2+ years of experience on Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate for Integration with Payment system , Banking , KYC        Design Pattern Circuit Breaker and Auto routing is must.                             Must have experience with at least some flavours of both SQL (MySQL, Postgres) and NoSQL (MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, DynamoDB etc) datastores in production                 Must have experience with Kafka or similar message queue systems in production        Stellar problem solving skills              Hunger to learn new things and ability to grasp new concepts quickly              Ability to move quickly without breaking things too much (we are dreamers)              Ability to work under immense pressure which is balanced by a sense of responsibility and ownership              Should be able to groom juniors and take them to the next level
